Package org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.simulation

Class AvatarSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.simulation.Simulation
      • org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.simulation.AvatarSimulation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvatarMDDSimulation
    public class AvatarSimulation
extends Simulation
    Avatar simulation for the discovery of point and complex attractors.
    Class providing all the functionalities to explore STGs, extend and rewire cycles.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rui Henriques, Pedro T. Monteiro, Nuno Mendes

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  AvatarSimulation.AvatarStrategy
      enum specifying the different behavioral strategies of Avatar

      • calculateComplexAttractor

        public StateSet calculateComplexAttractor​(StateSet Ct,
                                          List<StateSet> temporaryTransients,
                                          PriorityQueue<StateSet> savedTransients)
        Calculates a complex attractor based on the knowledge of previous incarnations
        Parameters:
        savedTransients - PriorityQueue saved
        Ct - terminal cycles from all incarnations
        temporaryTransients - the current time
        Returns:
        the revised complex attractor

      • rewriteGraph

        public void rewriteGraph​(StateSet cycle,
                         StateSet out,
                         FinalPaths pi)
                  throws Exception
        Method for rewiring a cycle
        Parameters:
        cycle - the cycle (state-set) to be rewired
        out - the exit states
        pi - the transitions between cycle and exit states whose probability is to be adjusted
        Throws:
        Exception - an exception

      • extendCycle

        public void extendCycle​(State v,
                        StateSet cycle,
                        StateSet exits,
                        StateSet newstates,
                        int i,
                        int tau,
                        Map<String,​Integer> time,
                        int originalTime)
        Method for extending cycles before rewiring
        Parameters:
        v - the state being expanded (null at the start)
        cycle - the state-set representing the initial cycle
        exits - the extended cycle
        i - the current time
        tau - the expansion rate
        time - structure maintaining the time/depth of the included states
        originalTime - the original time
        newstates - the new state
